alert.note: Alert for Kittson; Marshall; Norman; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 24 at 7:19PM CDT until June 24 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 407 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST MINNESOTA KITTSON MARSHALL NORMAN PENNINGTON POLK RED LAKE ROSEAU IN NORTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH DAKOTA BENSON CAVALIER EDDY GRAND FORKS NELSON PEMBINA RAMSEY TOWNER WALSH IN SOUTHEAST NORTH DAKOTA BARNES CASS GRIGGS STEELE TRAILL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADA, ANETA, ARGYLE, CANDO, CAVALIER, COOPERSTOWN, CROOKSTON, DEVILS LAKE, DRAYTON, EAST GRAND FORKS, FARGO, FINLEY, FORT TOTTEN, GRAFTON, GRAND FORKS, GREENBUSH, HALLOCK, HALSTAD, HATTON, HILLSBORO, HOPE, KARLSTAD, LAKOTA, LANCASTER, LANGDON, LEEDS, MADDOCK, MAYVILLE, MCVILLE, MINNEWAUKAN, NECHE, NEW ROCKFORD, PARK RIVER, PEMBINA, PORTLAND, RED LAKE FALLS, ROSEAU, ST. THOMAS, STEPHEN, THIEF RIVER FALLS, TOLNA, TWIN VALLEY, VALLEY CITY, WALHALLA, WARREN, AND WARROAD.

area.areaDesc: Kittson; Marshall; Norman; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake; Roseau
